description: Court-grade confirmatory test for periodic phase-locking in CMB spherical harmonics
statistic_definition: R(P) = |mean over (ℓ,m) of exp(i Δφ_ℓm(P))| where Δφ_ℓm(P) = arg(a_{ℓ+P,m}) - arg(a_ℓm)
null_model_description: Randomize phases uniformly in [0, 2π) while preserving |a_ℓm| and thus C_ℓ. Enforce reality constraints: a_ℓ,-m = (-1)^m conj(a_ℓm), a_ℓ,0 real.
significance_threshold_description: p < 0.01 for PASS, p ≥ 0.01 for NULL
multiple_testing_rationale: Only 2 pre-registered periods, no correction needed
replication_requirement: Signal must appear in at least 2 independent datasets (e.g., E-mode polarization, different component separation) with consistent p-values
notes: This pre-registration locks all analysis parameters before examining data.
No modifications allowed after pre-registration date.
Dataset SHA-256 must be computed and verified before running test.
